name: Black and White Runner
description:
Black and White Runner is an endless runner game where you jump, slide, and phase through obstacles.

The game features minimalistic graphics and color schemes in line with its philosophy. In a polarizing world that wants to see everything as black and white, one must be unrelenting and quick on their wits to overcome life's obstacles. 

- A simple one-button action for all your jumping, sliding, and helicopter kicking needs.

- Swap your color between black and white as you'll phase through walls and objects of the same color.

- Beware of the red colored obstacles, as they cannot be phased through!
